title: Multifocal region-assisted cross-modality learning for chest X-ray report generation
details: J Lian, Z Dong, H Zhang, Y Chen, J Liu - Computers in Biology and Medicine, 2024
abstract: The prevalence of cardiovascular disease, tumors, and other chronic illnesses has been steadily rising in recent years. Researchers have recently been employing cross-modal large-scale models and natural language generation models to address …
